commands.name: waba resale activate --client <name>
commands.purpose: Enable real-estate resale magic mode and defaults for existing clients.

commands.name: waba resale import --client <name> --csv <file> --magic-start
commands.purpose: Import 20-100 leads and auto-seed nurture sequences.

commands.name: waba resale magic-start --client <name>
commands.purpose: Queue 1/3/7/14-day re-engagement workflows from imported leads.

commands.name: waba resale metrics --client <name> --hours 48
commands.purpose: Show first-48-hour wow KPIs (re-engaged, qualified, brochure, site visit).
